paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: associated with breast cancer and medulloblastoma

individual_records.phenotype_details: associated with breast cancer and medulloblastoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the upstream region, we detected a pathogenic splice mutation, BRCA2 c.-39-1_-39delGA (rs758732038), in a patient, and the mutation was reported in ClinVar as likely pathogenic.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is reported in ClinVar as likely pathogenic.

variants.additional_notes: The mutation has also been reported in patients with breast cancer and medulloblastoma.
key_quotes: In the upstream region, we detected a pathogenic splice mutation, BRCA2 c.-39-1_-39delGA (rs758732038), in a patient, and the mutation was reported in ClinVar as likely pathogenic.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
